stance_1: I believe ruminant meats are healthiest for me
stance_2: Eating ruminant meat improved my health
justification: The interviewee states that eating ruminant meats improved their health and directly connects this to their belief that ruminant meats are healthiest for them.

stance_2: I try to buy high quality meat
justification: The interviewee states a preference for beef and lamb and explicitly links it to seeking high quality meat (organic, grass-fed, clean).

stance_1: I eat meat all the time
justification: The interviewee explicitly contrasts their current frequent meat eating with their previous veganism.
